episodes.title: Episode #15 - Narco-Satanists: The Cult of Blood and Fear
episodes.description:
In the late 1980s, a cult led by Adolfo Constanzo blended black magic with drug trafficking — and left a trail of human sacrifices in Matamoros, Mexico. Among their victims was college student Mark Kilroy, whose brutal murder exposed the Narco-Satanists to the world. Dark rituals, blood offerings, and a belief in supernatural protection… this is a case where true crime crosses into pure nightmare. Make sure to listen on Spotify, YouTube, iheartradio, & Podbean. Follow us on TikTok & Instagram! #fyp #fypシ #truecrimecommunity #horror #crime #ritual #mexico #scary #podcast
